summary: Devi Lal Singh, a typical youth with an anomalous standard of living, tries to find pleasure in whatever he does. He eventually becomes a thief and dons a new name, Devil.
cast: Saurabh Dhingra|Salman Khan|Jacqueline Fernandez|Nawazuddin Siddiqui|Randeep Hooda|Mithun Chakraborty|Archana Puran Singh|Sumona Chakravarti|Sanjay Mishra|Saurabh Shukla|Karan Aanand|Parthaa Akerkar|Kavin Dave|Rajshri Deshpande|Ranjan Dumra|Nargis Fakhri|Rajit Kapoor|McCormick Max|Angela Momandian|Sunil Pal|Vipin Sharma|Sunil Upadhyay|Rocky Verma|Tony Sweeney
title: Kick
